class.name: Acrostic
class.desc: Grouping of the first letter of each line that form a word or words

objectProperty.name: assignsAuthorship
objectProperty.label: Does the acrostic mention the author(s) and their name(s) match(es) the standard name?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the person or persons (Person) that are referred in the acrostic as creators of the work

objectProperty.name: assignsAuthorship
objectProperty.label: Does the acrostic specify the authorship in a way that requires further analysis (wrong attribution, alternative names, etc.)
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the name (Denomination) that is said to be the author (it might be a wrong attribution)

objectProperty.name: isContainedIn
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Redaction (version of the Opus) in which the Acrostic is present

objectProperty.name: mentions
objectProperty.label: Does the acrostic mention any persons?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a Person that is referred in the Acrostic

objectProperty.name: mentions
objectProperty.label: Does the acrostic mention any places?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a Place that is referred in the Acrostic

dataProperty.name: content
dataProperty.label: Contents
dataProperty.desc: Full content of the acrostic, that is, the letters

dataProperty.name: isAbecedarius
dataProperty.label: Is it an abecedarius?
dataProperty.desc: Whether the composition is an abecedarius, that is an acrostic in which the first letter of every word, strophe or verse follows the order of the alphabet

dataProperty.name: mentionedDate
dataProperty.label: Mentioned date
dataProperty.desc: The date referred in the acrostic

class.name: Apparatus
class.desc: The recording of each variant (and additional notes related with the reading)

objectProperty.name: analyses
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Redaction whose analytical information is contained in the Apparatus

objectProperty.name: analyses
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Line whose analytical information is contained in the Apparatus

objectProperty.name: hasRelationsWith
objectProperty.label: Does the apparatus provide information about other works that are related somehow to this one (without specifying the particular relation)?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a cultural product (Intertextuality) which has a generic intertextual relationship with the work under analysis

objectProperty.name: hasContemporaryRelation
objectProperty.label: Does the apparatus provide information about other contemporary works that are related to this one ?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a cultural product (Intertextuality) which is contemporary to the work under analysis and some kind of intertextual relationship is detected

objectProperty.name: hasDerivedWork
objectProperty.label: Does the apparatus provide information about other works based on this one?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a cultural product (Intertextuality) which was based on the work under analysis

objectProperty.name: usesAsSource
objectProperty.label: Does the apparatus provide information about other works that were the base/source of this one?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a cultural product (Intertextuality) which was a source for the work under analysis

objectProperty.name: mentions
objectProperty.desc: This property points to an instance of Word to provide further information of a word referred in the Apparatus

objectProperty.name: isReading
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Witness that contains the reading of the lemma

objectProperty.name: hasVariant
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the instance of Reading that contains a variant reading

dataProperty.name: lemma
dataProperty.label: Lemma
dataProperty.desc: Contains the lemma, or base text, of a textual variation

dataProperty.name: location
dataProperty.label: Location of the apparatus
dataProperty.desc: It defines the location of the textual variation the apparatus is analysing (e.g. line number)

dataProperty.name: criticalNote
dataProperty.label: Additional critical note
dataProperty.desc: Analytical commentary by the Editor

class.name: Reading
class.desc: Individual reading whitin an apparatus entry

objectProperty.name: isReading
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Witness that contains the reading

objectProperty.name: hasLemma
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the instance of Apparatus for which the item at hand models a variant reading

objectProperty.name: mentions
objectProperty.desc: This property points to an instance of Word to provide further information of a word referred in the Reading

dataProperty.name: variant
dataProperty.label: Variant reading
dataProperty.desc: Recording of a variant reading

dataProperty.name: location
dataProperty.label: Location of the variant
dataProperty.desc: It defines the location of the variant analysing (e.g. line number)

dataProperty.name: typeOfVariant
dataProperty.label: Type of variant
dataProperty.desc: Description of the type of variant. Eg. “substantial”, or “graphic”.

dataProperty.name: criticalNote
dataProperty.label: Additional critical note
dataProperty.desc: Analytical commentary by the Editor

class.name: BibliographicSource
class.desc: It represents and/or describes a specific resource (published or unpublished). This class includes the source from which an electronic text was derived or generated, usually a bibliographic description of a printed edition Vasconcelos, Carolina Michaëlis de. Randglossen zum altportugiesischen Liederbuch, 1902.

objectProperty.name: isPart
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the bibliographic item (BibliographicSource) that contains the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: hasPart
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a section (an instance of BibliographicSource) contained in the item at hand

objectProperty.name: isEditionOfAuthor
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Person whose work is edited in the bibliographic item at hand (the current instance of BibliographicSource)

objectProperty.name: edits
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the element (Witness) that is edited in the bibliographic item at hand (the current instance of BibliographicSource)

objectProperty.name: belongsTo
objectProperty.label: Is this item kept in a library, repository, etc?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the library or other type of repository where the bibliographic item (the current instance of BibliographicSource) is kept

objectProperty.name: catalogues
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the PrimarySource that is indexed or catalogued in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: edits
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Melody that is edited in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: edits
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Facsimile that is edited in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: edits
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Opus that is edited in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: edits
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the PrimarySource that is edited in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: edits
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Redaction that is edited in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: edits
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Ensemble that is edited in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: hasCreator
objectProperty.label: Do you know what person(s) wrote this Work?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to one of the persons (an instance of Person) who has created the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: hasCreator
objectProperty.label: Do you know what organisation(s) wrote this Work?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Organisation that has created the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: hasEditor
objectProperty.label: Do you know what organisation(s) edited this Work?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Organisation that has created the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: hasEditor
objectProperty.label: Do you know what person(s) edited this Work?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Person that has edited the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: hasTranslator
objectProperty.label: Do you know who translated this Work?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Person that has translated the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: isOriginal
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the work (and instance of Opus) which is a translation of the current reference (the instance at hand of BibliographicSource)

objectProperty.name: indexes
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Redaction that was indexed in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: isPreviousEdition
objectProperty.desc: This property points to Redaction of which the current instance of BibliographicSource is a previous edition

objectProperty.name: providesText
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Redaction whose text was copied from the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: providesTranslation
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Redaction whose text was copied from the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: records
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a Event that is presented in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: references
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a PrimarySource that is mentioned in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: references
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a Redaction that is mentioned in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: references
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a Ensemble that is mentioned in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: references
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a Person who is mentioned in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: references
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a Melody that is mentioned in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: references
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a Opus that is mentioned in the bibliographic item at hand, that is, the current instance of BibliographicSource

objectProperty.name: hasTheSameContent
objectProperty.desc: This property points to an instance of PrimarySource that has the same contents as the item at hand

objectProperty.name: refersThrough
objectProperty.label: Do you know the exact page(s) where the reference is done?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a specific Location (eg. volume, page number) of bibliographic item at hand in which a relevant piece of information is given

dataProperty.name: title
dataProperty.label: Title
dataProperty.desc: An identifying name given to a text or tune

dataProperty.name: subtitle
dataProperty.label: Subtitle
dataProperty.desc: A secondary, usually explanatory title

dataProperty.name: altTitle
dataProperty.label: Additional title
dataProperty.desc: Alternative name, other known denominations of a text or tune

dataProperty.name: catalogueNumber
dataProperty.label: Catalogue number
dataProperty.desc: Alphanumeric string used to identify an item in a Repository

dataProperty.name: date
dataProperty.label: Date of publication
dataProperty.desc: A particular point or period of time at which something happened or existed, or is expected to happen

dataProperty.name: from
dataProperty.label: From (date range)
dataProperty.desc: Start date of a time-interval. In a closed-range interval it is used with to in order to define the range

dataProperty.name: to
dataProperty.label: To (date range)
dataProperty.desc: End date of a time-interval. In a closed-range interval it is used with from in order to define the range

dataProperty.name: firstEditionDate
dataProperty.label: Date of first edition
dataProperty.desc: Date of first edition

dataProperty.name: pubPlace
dataProperty.label: Place of publication
dataProperty.desc: Place of publication of the bibliographic item

dataProperty.name: publisher
dataProperty.label: Publisher
dataProperty.desc: Publisher/publishing house of the bibliographic item

dataProperty.name: numberOfVolumes
dataProperty.label: Number of volumes
dataProperty.desc: Total number of volumes

dataProperty.name: volumeNumber
dataProperty.label: Volume number
dataProperty.desc: Number of the volume

dataProperty.name: issueNumber
dataProperty.label: Issue Number
dataProperty.desc: Number of issue

dataProperty.name: sectionNumber
dataProperty.label: Number of section/chapter
dataProperty.desc: Number of the current item when it belongs to a greater unit (e.g. number of chapter)

dataProperty.name: editionNumber
dataProperty.label: Number of edition
dataProperty.desc: Number of edition

dataProperty.name: scope
dataProperty.label: Scope
dataProperty.desc: Range of pages were the current item is located

dataProperty.name: label
dataProperty.label: Label
dataProperty.desc: String used to identify the item

dataProperty.name: numberOfPages
dataProperty.label: Number of pages
dataProperty.desc: Total number of pages of the bibliographic item

dataProperty.name: summary
dataProperty.label: Summary
dataProperty.desc: Abstract, synopsis, brief outline

dataProperty.name: typeOfBibliographicItem
dataProperty.label: Type of bibliographic item
dataProperty.desc: Type of the item chapter, catalogue, glossary, rhyming inventory, dictionary...

dataProperty.name: typeOfEdition
dataProperty.label: Type of edition
dataProperty.desc: If the bibliographic item is (or contains) an edition of the Opus, specify its type diplomatic edition

dataProperty.name: uri
dataProperty.label: URI
dataProperty.desc: URI to a Linked Open Data resource

dataProperty.name: url
dataProperty.label: URL
dataProperty.desc: Reference to a web resource that specifies its location on a computer network and a mechanism for retrieving it

dataProperty.name: notes
dataProperty.label: Notes
dataProperty.desc: Comment or explanations

class.name: Denomination
class.desc: A fictitious name, especially a pen name. A variant name.

objectProperty.name: isAssignedAsAuthor
objectProperty.label: Is this paratextual information present in the Witness?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Witness where the name at hand (the current instance of Denomination) is mentioned as the author of the work

objectProperty.name: isAssignedAsAuthor
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Acrostic where the name at hand (the current instance of Denomination) is mentioned as the author of the work

objectProperty.name: isAssignedAsAuthor
objectProperty.label: Is this paratextual information present in the Witness?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the PrimarySource where the name at hand (the current instance of Denomination) is mentioned as the author of the work

objectProperty.name: correspondsTo
objectProperty.label: With whom is this name associated?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Person to whom the name at hand (the current instance of Denomination) is related

objectProperty.name: creates
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Opus that was created by the name at hand (the current instance of Denomination). This propery is especially conceived to link a heteronym to its works

objectProperty.name: isAssignedAsAuthor
objectProperty.label: Is this paratextual information present in a subdivision of the Manuscript or primary source?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Ensemble where the name at hand (the current instance of Denomination) is mentioned as the author of the work

objectProperty.name: isAssignedAsAuthor
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Paratext where the name at hand (the current instance of Denomination) is mentioned as the author of the work (e.g. index entry)

objectProperty.name: wasAssignedAsAuthor
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Opus of which the name at hand (the current instance of Denomination) it is said to be the author (likely a wrong attribution)

dataProperty.name: name
dataProperty.label: Name
dataProperty.desc: Contains a proper noun or noun phrase that refers the current item

dataProperty.name: typeOfDesignation
dataProperty.label: Type of designation/name
dataProperty.desc: Type of designation/name. E.g. pseudonym, heteronym, allonym, orthonym variant

dataProperty.name: date
dataProperty.label: Date
dataProperty.desc: A particular point or period of time at which something happened or existed, or is expected to happen

dataProperty.name: from
dataProperty.label: From (date range)
dataProperty.desc: Start date of a time-interval. In a closed-range interval it is used with to in order to define the range

dataProperty.name: to
dataProperty.label: To (date range)
dataProperty.desc: End date of a time-interval. In a closed-range interval it is used with from in order to define the range

dataProperty.name: notAfter
dataProperty.label: Not after (date)
dataProperty.desc: In uncertain dates, it specifies the latest possible date

dataProperty.name: notBefore
dataProperty.label: Not before (date)
dataProperty.desc: In uncertain dates, it specifies the earliest possible date

class.name: WitnessCollection
class.desc: Section of ensemble of witnesses related in the PrimarySource Each of the individual booksongs that form a collection in a codex

objectProperty.name: assignsAuthorship
objectProperty.label: Does this section/ensemble specify the authorship in a way that requires further analysis (wrong attribution, alternative names, etc.)
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a Denomination (name) that the current instance of the WitnessCollection mentions as an author of the work

objectProperty.name: hasMusic
objectProperty.label: Does it have music?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Melody of the current instance of WitnessCollection

objectProperty.name: hasEditor
objectProperty.label: Has a specific scholar edited this ensemble/section?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Person who has edited the current instance of the WitnessCollection

objectProperty.name: hasPart
objectProperty.label: Do you have information about the witnesses of the ensemble/section?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to one of the witnesses (an instance of Witness) that form the current instance of the WitnessCollection

objectProperty.name: hasCopyist
objectProperty.label: Do you have information about the copyist(s)?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to one of the persons (an instance of Person) who has participated in the copy of the current intance of WitnessCollection

objectProperty.name: hasInformant
objectProperty.label: Do you have information about the informant(s)?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to one of the persons (an instance of Person) who has participated as an informant for the materials of the current intance of WitnessCollection

objectProperty.name: hasItem
objectProperty.label: Does the ensemble/section contain any paratextual information?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to an instance of paratextual information (Paratext) contained by the WitnessCollection at hand

objectProperty.name: hasItem
objectProperty.label: Does the ensemble/section have any miniatures?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to one of the miniatures (an instance of Illustration) contained by the WitnessCollection at hand

objectProperty.name: isEditedIn
objectProperty.label: Is there any editions of the ensemble/section?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the specif part of a bibliographic item (Location) where an edition of the current instance of WitnessCollection is located

objectProperty.name: isPart
objectProperty.label: Do you want to have information about the container (e.g. manuscript)?
objectProperty.desc: This propery points to the instance of PrimarySource to which the WitnessCollection at hand belongs

objectProperty.name: isReproducedIn
objectProperty.label: Do you have information about any facsimiles?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a Facsimile of the current instance of WitnessCollection

objectProperty.name: comesFrom
objectProperty.label: Do you know the origin of the ensemble/section?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Place which is the provenance of the current instance of WitnessCollection

dataProperty.name: siglum
dataProperty.label: Siglum
dataProperty.desc: A letter or symbol which stands for a word or name, especially to denote a particular manuscript or edition of a text

dataProperty.name: location
dataProperty.label: Location
dataProperty.desc: The particular position of a piece of information in a text

dataProperty.name: isPrint
dataProperty.label: Is it print?
dataProperty.desc: Whether the item is printed

dataProperty.name: hasMusicSpace
dataProperty.label: Does it have space for music notation?
dataProperty.desc: Whether there was blank space for music notation

dataProperty.name: ageOfInformant
dataProperty.label: Age of informant
dataProperty.desc: Age of informer at the time the information is recorded

dataProperty.name: dateOfCollection
dataProperty.label: Date of collection
dataProperty.desc: Date when the textual materials are recorded

dataProperty.name: integrity
dataProperty.label: Integrity
dataProperty.desc: Preservation status of text

dataProperty.name: layoutNote
dataProperty.label: Layout note
dataProperty.desc: Commentary on the layout

dataProperty.name: lengthUnit

dataProperty.desc: Names the unit used for the measurement

dataProperty.name: lengthQuantity

dataProperty.name: numberOfColumns

dataProperty.name: numberOfPages

dataProperty.desc: Number of pages the copy occupies

dataProperty.name: numberOfRows
dataProperty.label: Number of rows
dataProperty.desc: Number of continuous lines of writing

dataProperty.name: numberOfStaves
dataProperty.label: Number of staves
dataProperty.desc: Number of staves

class.name: Ensemble
class.desc: A collection of works. This might be organized by author, by book song, by book of poems Les fleurs du mal

objectProperty.name: hasCreator
objectProperty.label: Do you know what person(s) wrote this Collection of Works?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to one of the persons (an instance of Person) who has created the current instance of the Ensemble

objectProperty.name: hasPart
objectProperty.desc: This property points to one of the works (an instance of Opus) which form the current element under analysis

objectProperty.name: hasFirstWork
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the first work (an instance of Opus) which form the current element under analysis

objectProperty.name: hasPart
objectProperty.desc: This property points to one of the texts (an instance of Redaction) which form the current element under analysis

objectProperty.name: hasEditor
objectProperty.label: Do you know what person(s) edited this Collection of Works?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Person who has edited the current instance of the Ensemble

objectProperty.name: isEditedIn
objectProperty.label: Is this collection of Works edited in a Bibliographic item?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the bibliographic item (BibliographicSource) that contains an edition of the current instance of Ensemble

objectProperty.name: isReferencedIn
objectProperty.label: Is this collection of Works referenced in a Bibliographic item?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to a bibliographic item (an instance of BibliographicSource) whose contents are related to the current item under analysis (usually, its specific bibliography)

objectProperty.name: comesFrom
objectProperty.label: Do you know the origin of the collection?
objectProperty.desc: This property points to the Place which is the provenance of the current instance of Ensemble

objectProperty.name: hasRole

class.name: Facsimile
class.desc: An exact copy, especially of written or printed material. E.g. A facsimile of the manuscript

objectProperty.name: isProvidedBy
